p: As was depicted by the numismatic figures ( Figure 13), herbivore animals love to feed on the fruits of the silphion plant. In fact, due to consumption by livestock residing in the nearby shelter, we were not able to find a single stalk with fruits in the small population of F. drudeana growing in the adjacent lot of a stone-walled orchard. If the garden where F. drudeana is growing was not protected by the piled stone-wall ( Figure 14), the F. drudeana population growing there might have been destroyed by now, as happened in the neighboring lot.
